Values.5_d_0: <speaker=_NPC1>I would love to tell you something about me.</speaker>
Values.5_d_2: <speaker=_NPC1>But {NPC.school_pierre.nameFirst} really doesn't like me speaking to other guys.</speaker>

Values.5_d_0: <speaker=_NPC1>I would love to tell you something about me.</speaker>
Values.5_d_2: <speaker=_NPC1>But {NPC.school_pierre.nameFirst} gets angry if I chat too much with other gals.</speaker>
